actions.text: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Culberson.

description: At the end of title I, add the following:    SEC. 1__. FLOOD MITIGATION AND RIERINE RESTORATION PROGRAM.    The Secretary shall expedite carrying out the project for flood risk management, Brays Bayou, Texas, authorized by item 6 in section 211(f) of the Water Resources Development Act of 1996 (Public Law 104-303).
purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-794 to direct the Secretary to expedite the Brays Bayou flood mitigation project authorized by item 6 in section 211(f) of the Water Resources Development Act of 1996.
